description: This is an HTML source file that provides the structure and styling for a web-based database viewer UI, including embedded JavaScript for dynamic interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads the list of databases from the API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by re-fetching data and updating UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables of a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Builds HTML to display table data in a tabular format.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, large text, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for full view of large text or objects.
